text: The United States Census of 1870 was the ninth United States Census. It was done by the Census Bureau in June 1870. The 1870 Census was the first census to give detailed information on the black population. The population was 38,555,983 individuals. This was a 22.62% increase since 1860. Category:1870 in North America Category:1870s in the United States Category:United States Census
title: 1870 United States Census
